Post.title: mysqlGEARMAN
Post._content:
##### ? #####

gearmanjob server  
MySQL  
##### gearman #####
``	
http://gearman.org/manual/job_server/#persistent_queues``  
#####  #####
mysql ``mysql -uroot -p`` 
![](http://oih4t7o53.bkt.clouddn.com/gearman2/1.jpg)
```mysql
CREATE DATABASE gearman;
 
CREATE TABLE `gearman_queue` (
`unique_key` varchar(64) NOT NULL,
`function_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
`priority` int(11) NOT NULL,
`data` longblob NOT NULL,
`when_to_run` int(11),
PRIMARY KEY (`unique_key`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
```
mysqlgearman  
``` mysql
grant all privileges on gearman.* to gearman@'%' identified by '123456';
flush privileges;
exit;
```
![gearman](http://oih4t7o53.bkt.clouddn.com/gearman2/2.jpg)  
3306  
![gearman](http://oih4t7o53.bkt.clouddn.com/gearman2/3.jpg)

```shell
gearmand -q mysql --mysql-host=192.168.18.16 --mysql-port=3306 --mysql-user=gearman --mysql-password=123456 --mysql-db=gearman --mysql-table=gearman_queue
```
